channel.title: CVE Feed for Fujitsu Limited -- Fujitsu Software Infrastructure Manager Advanced Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fujitsu Limited -- Fujitsu Software Infrastructure Manager Advanced Edition

item.title: CVE-2023-39379|2024-10-21T19:29:32.915Z -- fujitsu%20limited -- fujitsu%20software%20infrastructure%20manager%20advanced%20edition
item.description: Fujitsu Software Infrastructure Manager (ISM) stores sensitive information at the product's maintenance data (ismsnap) in cleartext form. As a result, the password for the proxy server that is configured in ISM may be retrieved. Affected products and versions are as follows: Fujitsu Software Infrastructure Manager Advanced Edition V2.8.0.060, Fujitsu Software Infrastructure Manager Advanced Edition for PRIMEFLEX V2.8.0.060, and Fujitsu Software Infrastructure Manager Essential Edition V2.8.0.060.
